programme.title: I Spy
Ja, špijun
programme.desc:
I Spy: Directed by Betty Thomas. With Eddie Murphy, Owen Wilson, Famke Janssen, Malcolm McDowell. A professional athlete has to help a U.S. government agent recover a missing jet." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0297181/","name":"I Spy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzMzc1MDUtYzE0OS00MWQwLWI0MTEtNWU1ZWM2NTI2NGIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A professional athlete has to help a U.S. government agent recover a missing jet.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0297181/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"NoArrow"},"dateCreated":"2003-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hilarious sometimes, annoying at others","reviewBody":""I Spy" is an action comedy starring Owen Wilson as the opposite of your usual James Bond, and Eddie Murphy as the cocky boxer assigned to help him. Wilson and Murphy are pretty funny together, but sometimes their constant arguing gets overdone and rather old.

Still, the two have good chemistry and you will always be sure to laugh when you put on "I Spy". About the action, well, it's okay. It sure isn't as good as "Bad Boys" or "Bad Company", but that's not really what this film is geared for anyway. Plus, Murphy and Wilson are STILL ARGUING during the action (this is when it gets old!).

Entertaining, but a little annoying, I give "I Spy" a 6.5/10."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50846,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2003-02-19","keywords":"stealth,boxer,espionage,spy,boxing","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"I Spy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2481258777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzhmNDYwMTUtZjE1NC00OTE2LTg1ZDYtZjg3N2JiZTA5ZmUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzhmNDYwMTUtZjE1NC00OTE2LTg1ZDYtZjg3N2JiZTA5ZmUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000552/","name":"Eddie Murphy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000463/","name":"Famke Janssen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0858525/","name":"Betty Thomas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089889/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066021/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0277643/","name":"Morton S. A professional athlete has to help a U.S. government agent recover a missing jet." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0297181/","name":"I Spy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzMzc1MDUtYzE0OS00MWQwLWI0MTEtNWU1ZWM2NTI2NGIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A professional athlete has to help a U.S. government agent recover a missing jet.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0297181/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"NoArrow","dateCreated":"2003-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hilarious sometimes, annoying at others","reviewBody":""I Spy" is an action comedy starring Owen Wilson as the opposite of your usual James Bond, and Eddie Murphy as the cocky boxer assigned to help him. Wilson and Murphy are pretty funny together, but sometimes their constant arguing gets overdone and rather old.

Still, the two have good chemistry and you will always be sure to laugh when you put on "I Spy". About the action, well, it's okay. It sure isn't as good as "Bad Boys" or "Bad Company", but that's not really what this film is geared for anyway. Plus, Murphy and Wilson are STILL ARGUING during the action (this is when it gets old!).

Entertaining, but a little annoying, I give "I Spy" a 6.5/10.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50846,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2003-02-19","keywords":"stealth,boxer,espionage,spy,boxing","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"I Spy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2481258777","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzhmNDYwMTUtZjE1NC00OTE2LTg1ZDYtZjg3N2JiZTA5ZmUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzhmNDYwMTUtZjE1NC00OTE2LTg1ZDYtZjg3N2JiZTA5ZmUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Tristar","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000552/","name":"Eddie Murphy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000463/","name":"Famke Janssen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0858525/","name":"Betty Thomas"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089889/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066021/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0277643/","name":"Morton S. programme.title: The Legend of Zorro
The Legend of Zorro
programme.desc:
The Legend of Zorro: Directed by Martin Campbell. With Alberto Reyes, Julio Oscar Mechoso, Gustavo Sánchez Parra, Adrian Alonso. Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, to take action." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0386140/","name":"The Legend of Zorro","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE1MjVmYTYtOGFjZi00NGM3LTg0ZTEtNWI4MGI3NmM1MTVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, to take action.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0386140/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ms_jade_li"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Formulaic, but reminiscent of old style westerns -- with a Latino cast","reviewBody":"I liked the film.

You aren't going to get a more aesthetic movie than this: the actors (wow, Antonio and Catherine Zeta both in the same movie -- Anjelina & Brad, eat your hearts out -- no contest!), the costumes, the lighting, the villa and townscapes, and the sheer beauty of the location, day and night.

Antonio looks a little more "mature" than I've seen him in awhile, but he's no less smoldering and charming on the screen. He's a natural for playing Zorro. The athleticism of Zorro is pretty impressive too. Lots of leaps, flips, and creative uses of his whip.

Catherine-Zeta is breathtakingly beautiful, as always. Those eyes of hers... It's enjoyable to see her in a maternal role. I love her costumes! It's good to see her multi-tasking.

Their son, Joaquim, is outstanding. Child stars usually make me gag, but this kid has genuine talent, and the person(s) filming and editing have admirably captured it.

The main bad guy (the one with the mansion) is intriguing as well. Not sure who he is but I hope to see more of him.

The other villain is, plain and simple, unidimensional, which is typical of adventure type movies. No surprises there. The way he meets his end is creative.

The Horse. Wow.

The political framework of the plot worked well for the movie.

If you're looking for a movie that entertains while being pleasing to the eye, check it out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98872,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-11-09","keywords":"abraham lincoln character,good versus evil,good man,good woman,four word title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Legend of Zorro","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4092920089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmMyZTUwNDMtZWQ2ZC00MjFhLWE5MzYtYTk3MDFlOTBiYTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmMyZTUwNDMtZWQ2ZC00MjFhLWE5MzYtYTk3MDFlOTBiYTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001876/","name":"Catherine Zeta-Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001722/","name":"Rufus Sewell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0132709/","name":"Martin Campbell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132178/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0649460/","name":"Roberto Orci"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0476064/","name":"Alex Kurtzman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254645/","name":"Ted Elliott"}],"duration":"PT2H9M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Spider-Man
Spider-Man
programme.desc:
Spider-Man: Directed by Sam Raimi. With Tobey Maguire, Willem Dafoe, Kirsten Dunst, James Franco. When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0145487/","name":"Spider-Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDEyN2NhMjgtMjdhNi00MmNlLWE5YTgtZGE4MzNjMTRlMGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDUyOTg3Njg@._V1_.jpg","description":"When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0145487/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"to_kill_better"},"dateCreated":"2002-06-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazingly Spectacularly Great","reviewBody":"Having seen the trailers for this film I have to say that I didn't walk into the cinema with high hopes. The computer effects looked badly integrated, the Green Goblin's costume looked awful and comic book adaptations usually have such painful scripting and plotting. Thankfully I was wrong on most counts (The Goblin still looks rubbish).

As it turns out, this is probably the best super-hero film I've yet seen - certainly up there with Superman and Batman. People seem to automatically comment that the script and acting was bad because they expect it to be the case in these films; and indeed it usually is. But if you go into Spider-man without this prejudicial attitude you'll be pleasently suprised. The acting is generally great - there is never a time when anyone is not believable as their character and you think "Hey, that's an actor, not Peter Parker". The effects do look artificial but the pace of the movie means you don't have time to dwell on this and the script is fine! What do people want, Shakespearian soliloquies? That would sound incredibly out-of-place in modern day New York. There are few of the painful cliches or dreadful dialogue that plague films like The Phantom Menace and the catchphrases like "friendly neighbourhood spider-man" are fully in-keeping with the character.

 The comic turns from J.J. Jameson hit the mark, the snarling facial contortions of Willem Defoe were suitably evil-looking (and the conversation with his mirror-image was a great touch). My only gripe was with the Green Goblin's costume. Very monotone green and not very scary.

All-in-all a great film that I wouldn't hesitate for a second in recommending."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":755785,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2002-06-12","keywords":"superhero,may parker character,peter parker character,ben parker character,spiderweb","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Spider-Man","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1497605145","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyMDYyNzU0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1NDk2OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyMDYyNzU0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1NDk2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2 for Spider-Man"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001497/","name":"Tobey Maguire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000379/","name":"Kirsten Dunst"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000353/","name":"Willem Dafoe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095403/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498278/","name":"Stan Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0228492/","name":"Steve Ditko"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Spider-Man 2: Directed by Sam Raimi. With Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, James Franco, Alfred Molina. Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0316654/","name":"Spider-Man 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY2ODk4NmUtOTVmNi00ZTdkLTlmOWYtMmE2OWVhNTU2OTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0316654/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ditkovich_rent"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"This movie has a criminally low rating","reviewBody":"7.3/10? Seriously? Most mediocre MCU films get a better rating than that. This movie is up there with The Dark Knight as one of the best superhero movies. This movie was loved when it came out, now it's cool to hate on the trilogy. Spider-Man 2 improved on all aspects of Spider-Man 1. Peter is struggling to be Spider-Man, and the movie illustrates that very well. The action is better than lots of movies today, most notably the train fight scene. Danny Elfman provides an unforgettable soundtrack. Seriously? Most mediocre MCU films get a better rating than that. This movie is up there with The Dark Knight as one of the best superhero movies. This movie was loved when it came out, now it's cool to hate on the trilogy. Spider-Man 2 improved on all aspects of Spider-Man 1. Peter is struggling to be Spider-Man, and the movie illustrates that very well. The action is better than lots of movies today, most notably the train fight scene. Danny Elfman provides an unforgettable soundtrack. This movie and the trilogy shouldn't be overlooked as some cheesy 2000s movies, because they paved the way for the MCU as we know it today.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":601585,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2004-07-14","keywords":"peter parker character,older actors younger roles,may parker character,spider man character,ben parker character","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Spider-Man 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi629801241","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWZmNmMyMjUtMjA2ZC00MjMxLTk1NTEtMjdhYmYxNWUxZTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWZmNmMyMjUtMjA2ZC00MjMxLTk1NTEtMjdhYmYxNWUxZTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001497/","name":"Tobey Maguire","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000379/","name":"Kirsten Dunst","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000547/","name":"Alfred Molina"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095134/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095403/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498278/","name":"Stan Lee","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0228492/","name":"Steve Ditko","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0332184/","name":"Alfred Gough"],"duration":"PT2H7M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Spider-Man 3: Directed by Sam Raimi. With Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, James Franco, Thomas Haden Church. A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0413300/","name":"Spider-Man 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTk3MDljOWQtNGI2My00OTEzLTlhYjQtOTQ4ODM2MzUwY2IwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413300/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Special-K88"},"dateCreated":"2007-05-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"some good things but it never comes together","reviewBody":"Third entry has Peter Parker and alter ego Spider-Man fighting what could possibly be the greatest battle of his life. The intrepid Parker is on top of the world as N.Y.C. citizens have finally come to appreciate all of his heroic deeds, but more importantly he's found a stable relationship with Mary Jane Watson. His seemingly perfect existence comes to an abrupt halt when he learns that his uncle's real killer is still at large, acquires a rival at the Daily Bugle, and best friend-turned-bitter adversary Harry Osborn comes seeking revenge. Peter also bonds with an unusual black symbiote that unleashes a darker side of him and threatens to destroy everything he holds dear. Some effective moments of intense, exciting action and superior special effects are undermined by overlength, and juxtaposed against moments of corny, unintentionally funny human drama. The ingredients for a success are there, including a good cast and some interesting subplots, but they can't overcome a leaden script which chooses to revel in its mawkish material rather than flesh out its characters or tell a coherent story. Watchable, but never as engaging or spectacular as its predecessors. **½"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":546035,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2007-05-01","keywords":"villain,peter parker character,alien parasite,alien symbiote,coffeeshop","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Spider-Man 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi826343961","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGYzNWJlMDEtM2MwOS00NTA3LThjMWItYmIzZjQ0MzI4MDFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGYzNWJlMDEtM2MwOS00NTA3LThjMWItYmIzZjQ0MzI4MDFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this third installment in the superhero film series"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001497/","name":"Tobey Maguire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000379/","name":"Kirsten Dunst"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0333410/","name":"Topher Grace"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051941/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095403/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0706898/","name":"Ivan Raimi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0765091/","name":"Alvin Sargent"}],"duration":"PT2H19M"}</script><metacontent="

While still out to destroy the evil Umbrella Corporation, Alice joins a group of survivors living in a prison surrounded by the infected who also want to relocate to the mysterious but supposedly unharmed safe haven known only as Arcadia." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1220634/","name":"Resident Evil: Afterlife","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjRlMGQ0NmUtM2U2Ny00MTk3LTg5NjAtN2M3Y2JmZjllNjJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"While still out to destroy the evil Umbrella Corporation, Alice joins a group of survivors living in a prison surrounded by the infected who also want to relocate to the mysterious but supposedly unharmed safe haven known only as Arc","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1220634/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"msb-utils"},"dateCreated":"2010-10-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"no story, but enjoyable","reviewBody":"I liked this compilation of scenes. I liked the soundtrack; I liked the acting; I liked the settings; I liked the effects. As a game, it works greatly. The movie is a sum of chunks of stories. Most of them are action stories. A few are horror stories. Another few are mystery stories. And none of them are connected to each other. They just share common characters. \n\nHonestly, the plot is just an excuse for great action scenes. And I liked the action scenes. I rate it zero for the story, ten for the technical quality. And I have to admit it: in the end, I liked it as a whole.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":167824,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2010-10-20","keywords":"siege,ship,alaska,female gunfighter,mutation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Resident Evil: Afterlife - International Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi213583385","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk4MDE4NjY0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzQ0NzYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk4MDE4NjY0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzQ0NzYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a world ravaged by a virus infection, turning its victims into the Undead, Alice (Jovovich), continues on her journey to find survivors and lead them to safety. programme.title: Resident Evil: Istrebljenje
programme.desc: Film Resident Evil 3: Istrebljenje prikazuje život Alice i ostalih preživjelih koji su u borbi protiv smrtonosnog virusa koji sve ljude može pretvoriti u zombije. Film Resident Evil: Iskupljenje nastao je prema popularnoj seriji video igrica i radnja se nastavlja ondje gdje je završio prethodni nastavak. Dakle, Alice (Milla Jovovich) skriva se u pustinji Nevade i zajedno s ostalim borcima pokušava uništiti smrtonosni virus koji će, ako ne bude uništen, pretvoriti svakog čovjeka u zombija. Međutim, velika korporacija Umbrella u međuvremenu uhvati Alice...

programme.title: Resident Evil: Degeneracija
programme.desc: Sedam godina nakon uništenja Racoon Cityja, Claire Redfield čeka prijatelje koji bi trebali stići u zračnu luku Harvardville. Čovjek, zaražen T-virusom, pretvara se u zombija... Sedam godina nakon uništenja Racoon Cityja, Claire Redfield čeka prijatelje koji bi trebali stići u zračnu luku Harvardville. Čovjek, zaražen T-virusom, pretvara se u zombija i zarazi nekoliko putnika. Uskoro mjesto nastaje kaos, a zombiji ubijaju svakoga na koga naiđu. Claire se uspijeva skloniti s nekolicinom preživjelih u osamljenu sobu dok vlasti izoliraju zračnu luku...

Hidden within the messaging app is Textopolis, a bustling city where all your favorite emojis live, hoping to be selected by the phone's user. In this world, each emoji has only one facial expression - except for Gene, an exuberant emoji who was born without a filter and is bursting with multiple expressions. Determined to become "normal" like the other emojis, Gene enlists the help of his handy best friend Hi-5 and the notorious code breaker emoji Jailbreak. Together, they embark on an epic "app-venture" through the apps on the phone, each its own wild and fun world, to find the Code that will fix Gene. But when a greater danger threatens the phone, the fate of all emojis depends on these three unlikely friends who must save their world before it's deleted forever."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2554352/","name":"T.J. programme.title: Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within
Final Fantasy
programme.desc:
Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within: Directed by Hironobu Sakaguchi, Motonori Sakakibara. With Ming-Na Wen, Alec Baldwin, Ving Rhames, Steve Buscemi. A scientist makes a last stand on Earth with the help of a ragtag team of soldiers against an invasion of alien phantoms." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0173840/","name":"Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGNjZmNhYTYtMDE4OS00NjViLWEwNTQtZjQzOGY1M2MyYzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM5ODIyNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A scientist makes a last stand on Earth with the help of a ragtag team of soldiers against an invasion of alien phantoms.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0173840/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"accthomas"},"dateCreated":"2004-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Criminally Underrated","reviewBody":"Just to clear up a couple of points:-

a) This is a FILM, not a computer game. b) CGI people don't look or move exactly like real people. That stated, Aki Ross is still a more convincing character than ANYONE played by Keanu Reeves.

Final Fantasy is misnamed; there's little about the story that is "final", nor is it especially fantastic, but what it IS is a pretty decent mystical-science fiction (no, NOT "sci-fi" space opera) yarn. Possibly owing to the real inability to successfully portray facial expressions in the CGI characters, the mood throughout is sombre and hard... so rather more like real life than your average Hollywood space-opera swashbuckler. Frankly, because this story actually tries to make a POINT, it probably disappoints the type of viewer who would like a film like "Aliens". The overriding message is simply that brute force is no use without understanding, and that's a timeless message that many cultures would do well to think about.

And, of course, this film is just BEAUTIFUL. Probably best watched while tripping on acid, if the truth be told.

7/10 and a future classic, as far as I'm concerned. This film will be remembered long after things like "Starship Troopers" have been forgotten."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81405,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Animation","Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"2001-10-31","keywords":"based on video game,motion capture,profanity,weapons fire,movie flop","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi715587865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2Q4NmRlYmItYTA1Yy00MjI0LTliODktY2UzMWU4OTg4MDc5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2Q4NmRlYmItYTA1Yy00MjI0LTliODktY2UzMWU4OTg4MDc5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000285/","name":"Alec Baldwin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000114/","name":"Steve Buscemi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001840/","name":"Ming-Na Wen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0756983/","name":"Hironobu Sakaguchi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1012102/","name":"Motonori Sakakibara"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012408/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035851/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040831/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0756983/","name":"Hironobu Sakaguchi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718031/","name":"Al Reinert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0899113/","name":"Jeff Vintar"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Spider-Man
Spider-Man
programme.desc:
Spider-Man: Directed by Sam Raimi. With Tobey Maguire, Willem Dafoe, Kirsten Dunst, James Franco. When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0145487/","name":"Spider-Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDEyN2NhMjgtMjdhNi00MmNlLWE5YTgtZGE4MzNjMTRlMGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDUyOTg3Njg@._V1_.jpg","description":"When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0145487/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"to_kill_better"},"dateCreated":"2002-06-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazingly Spectacularly Great","reviewBody":"Having seen the trailers for this film I have to say that I didn't walk into the cinema with high hopes. The computer effects looked badly integrated, the Green Goblin's costume looked awful and comic book adaptations usually have such painful scripting and plotting. Thankfully I was wrong on most counts (The Goblin still looks rubbish).

As it turns out, this is probably the best super-hero film I've yet seen - certainly up there with Superman and Batman. People seem to automatically comment that the script and acting was bad because they expect it to be the case in these films; and indeed it usually is. But if you go into Spider-man without this prejudicial attitude you'll be pleasently suprised. The acting is generally great - there is never a time when anyone is not believable as their character and you think "Hey, that's an actor, not Peter Parker". The effects do look artificial but the pace of the movie means you don't have time to dwell on this and the script is fine! What do people want, Shakespearian soliloquies? That would sound incredibly out-of-place in modern day New York. There are few of the painful cliches or dreadful dialogue that plague films like The Phantom Menace and the catchphrases like "friendly neighbourhood spider-man" are fully in-keeping with the character.

 The comic turns from J.J. Jameson hit the mark, the snarling facial contortions of Willem Defoe were suitably evil-looking (and the conversation with his mirror-image was a great touch). My only gripe was with the Green Goblin's costume. Very monotone green and not very scary.

All-in-all a great film that I wouldn't hesitate for a second in recommending."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":755785,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2002-06-12","keywords":"superhero,may parker character,peter parker character,ben parker character,spiderweb","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Spider-Man","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1497605145","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyMDYyNzU0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1NDk2OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyMDYyNzU0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1NDk2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2 for Spider-Man"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001497/","name":"Tobey Maguire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000379/","name":"Kirsten Dunst"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000353/","name":"Willem Dafoe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095403/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498278/","name":"Stan Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0228492/","name":"Steve Ditko"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0145487, Title: Spider-Man, --- Description: Spider-Man: Directed by Sam Raimi. With Tobey Maguire, Willem Dafoe, Kirsten Dunst, James Franco. When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0145487/","name":"Spider-Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDEyN2NhMjgtMjdhNi00MmNlLWE5YTgtZGE4MzNjMTRlMGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDUyOTg3Njg@._V1_.jpg","description":"When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0145487/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"to_kill_better","dateCreated":"2002-06-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazingly Spectacularly Great","reviewBody":"Having seen the trailers for this film I have to say that I didn't walk into the cinema with high hopes. The computer effects looked badly integrated, the Green Goblin's costume looked awful and comic book adaptations usually have such painful scripting and plotting. Thankfully I was wrong on most counts (The Goblin still looks rubbish).

As it turns out, this is probably the best super-hero film I've yet seen - certainly up there with Superman and Batman. People seem to automatically comment that the script and acting was bad because they expect it to be the case in these films; and indeed it usually is. But if you go into Spider-man without this prejudicial attitude you'll be pleasently suprised. The acting is generally great - there is never a time when anyone is not believable as their character and you think "Hey, that's an actor, not Peter Parker". The effects do look artificial but the pace of the movie means you don't have time to dwell on this and the script is fine! What do people want, Shakespearian soliloquies? That would sound incredibly out-of-place in modern day New York. There are few of the painful cliches or dreadful dialogue that plague films like The Phantom Menace and the catchphrases like "friendly neighbourhood spider-man" are fully in-keeping with the character.

 The comic turns from J.J. Jameson hit the mark, the snarling facial contortions of Willem Defoe were suitably evil-looking (and the conversation with his mirror-image was a great touch). My only gripe was with the Green Goblin's costume. Very monotone green and not very scary.

All-in-all a great film that I wouldn't hesitate for a second in recommending.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":755785,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2002-06-12","keywords":"superhero,may parker character,peter parker character,ben parker character,spiderweb","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Spider-Man","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1497605145","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyMDYyNzU0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1NDk2OA@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyMDYyNzU0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1NDk2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2 for Spider-Man","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001497/","name":"Tobey Maguire","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000379/","name":"Kirsten Dunst","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000353/","name":"Willem Dafoe"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095134/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095403/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498278/","name":"Stan Lee","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0228492/","name":"Steve Ditko","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"],"duration":"PT2H1M"</script><metacontent="

Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Spider-Man 2: Directed by Sam Raimi. With Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, James Franco, Alfred Molina. Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0316654/","name":"Spider-Man 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY2ODk4NmUtOTVmNi00ZTdkLTlmOWYtMmE2OWVhNTU2OTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0316654/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ditkovich_rent"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"This movie has a criminally low rating","reviewBody":"7.3/10? Seriously? Most mediocre MCU films get a better rating than that. This movie is up there with The Dark Knight as one of the best superhero movies. This movie was loved when it came out, now it's cool to hate on the trilogy. Spider-Man 2 improved on all aspects of Spider-Man 1. Peter is struggling to be Spider-Man, and the movie illustrates that very well. The action is better than lots of movies today, most notably the train fight scene. Danny Elfman provides an unforgettable soundtrack. This movie and the trilogy shouldn't be overlooked as some cheesy 2000s movies, because they paved the way for the MCU as we know it today.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":601585,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2004-07-14","keywords":"peter parker character,older actors younger roles,may parker character,spider man character,ben parker character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Spider-Man 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi629801241","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWZmNmMyMjUtMjA2ZC00MjMxLTk1NTEtMjdhYmYxNWUxZTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWZmNmMyMjUtMjA2ZC00MjMxLTk1NTEtMjdhYmYxNWUxZTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001497/","name":"Tobey Maguire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000379/","name":"Kirsten Dunst"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000547/","name":"Alfred Molina"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095403/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498278/","name":"Stan Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0228492/","name":"Steve Ditko"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0332184/","name":"Alfred Gough"}],"duration":"PT2H7M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Spider-Man 3: Directed by Sam Raimi. With Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, James Franco, Thomas Haden Church. A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0413300/","name":"Spider-Man 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTk3MDljOWQtNGI2My00OTEzLTlhYjQtOTQ4ODM2MzUwY2IwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413300/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Special-K88"},"dateCreated":"2007-05-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"some good things but it never comes together","reviewBody":"Third entry has Peter Parker and alter ego Spider-Man fighting what could possibly be the greatest battle of his life. The intrepid Parker is on top of the world as N.Y.C. citizens have finally come to appreciate all of his heroic deeds, but more importantly he's found a stable relationship with Mary Jane Watson. His seemingly perfect existence comes to an abrupt halt when he learns that his uncle's real killer is still at large, acquires a rival at the Daily Bugle, and best friend-turned-bitter adversary Harry Osborn comes seeking revenge. Peter also bonds with an unusual black symbiote that unleashes a darker side of him and threatens to destroy everything he holds dear. Some effective moments of intense, exciting action and superior special effects are undermined by overlength, and juxtaposed against moments of corny, unintentionally funny human drama. The ingredients for a success are there, including a good cast and some interesting subplots, but they can't overcome a leaden script which chooses to revel in its mawkish material rather than flesh out its characters or tell a coherent story. Watchable, but never as engaging or spectacular as its predecessors. **½"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":546035,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2007-05-01","keywords":"villain,peter parker character,alien parasite,alien symbiote,coffeeshop","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Spider-Man 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi826343961","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGYzNWJlMDEtM2MwOS00NTA3LThjMWItYmIzZjQ0MzI4MDFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGYzNWJlMDEtM2MwOS00NTA3LThjMWItYmIzZjQ0MzI4MDFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this third installment in the superhero film series"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001497/","name":"Tobey Maguire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000379/","name":"Kirsten Dunst"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0333410/","name":"Topher Grace"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051941/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095403/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0706898/","name":"Ivan Raimi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0765091/","name":"Alvin Sargent"}],"duration":"PT2H19M"}</script><metacontent="

Spider-Man: Povratak kući
programme.desc: Spider-Man: Homecoming: Directed by Jon Watts. With Tom Holland, Michael Keaton, Robert Downey Jr., Marisa Tomei. Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2250912/","name":"Spider-Man: Homecoming","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTk4ODQ1MzgzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTMyMzM4MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2250912/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"andreascaloni"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"GREAT REBOOT","reviewBody":"Spider-Man Homecoming is a light movie that delivers a fun and colorful adventure with also a great message. It is well acted, sometimes smart and has a great lead character's development. However the villain's characterization is weak and they could have done something deeper in the final fight. programme.title: Black Sea
Black Sea
programme.desc:
Black Sea: Directed by Kevin Macdonald. With Jude Law, Karl Davies, Llewella Gideon, Jodie Whittaker. In order to make good with his former employers, a submarine captain takes a job with a shadowy backer to search the depths of the Black Sea for a submarine rumored to be loaded with gold." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2261331/","name":"Black Sea","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyNzI1ODA3OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTI5OTczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In order to make good with his former employers, a submarine captain takes a job with a shadowy backer to search the depths of the Black Sea for a submarine rumored to be loaded with gold.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2261331/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"xenomorph_uk"},"dateCreated":"2014-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"An enjoyable and solid thriller.","reviewBody":"If you enjoyed movies like U571, The Hunt for Red October & Crimson tide, then this movie is for you. In my personal opinion, it's not quite as good as the aforementioned titles, but it's certainly in the same league.

Black Sea has most of the right ingredients for a tense underwater thriller. It ticks pretty much every box in the genre from extremely intense survival scenes to flawed human characters. There are several thoroughly enjoyable claustrophobic scenes, which are only intensified by the clearly terrified crew.

There were only two weak points. They should've spent some time developing the characters a little more and perhaps making them a bit more likable so that you would care about their fates. The other minor point is the character's accents. Being British I was able to follow the various accents well enough, but I imagine it may be a little difficult to follow for viewers that aren't used to the inflections.

Black Sea is a solid and professional production and a must-see for anyone that enjoys movies with this sort of theme.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":37154,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-12-05","keywords":"submarine,sea,gold,black sea,drive shaft","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3431968537","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEwNDQxNjE5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjQ5NDgyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEwNDQxNjE5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjQ5NDgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rogue submarine captain pulls together a misfit crew to go after a sunken treasure rumored to be lost in the depths of the Black Sea. As greed and desperation take control onboard their claustrophobic vessel, the increasing uncertainty of the mission causes the men to turn on each other to fight for their own survival."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000179/","name":"Jude Law"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1058940/","name":"Scoot McNairy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578853/","name":"Ben Mendelsohn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0531817/","name":"Kevin Macdonald"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042399/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0104135/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2393111/","name":"Dennis Kelly"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

In my personal opinion, it's not quite as good as the aforementioned titles, but it's certainly in the same league.

programme.desc: Baiohazado: Damuneshon: Directed by Makoto Kamiya. With Matthew Mercer, Dave Wittenberg, Wendee Lee, Val Tasso. Special Agent Leon S.Kennedy goes against his superior's orders and works to destroy a series of biological weapons being used in a war zone in Europe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1753496/","name":"Baiohazado: Damuneshon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDY2M2RkMmMtNGY3Yy00MTg0LWJmMmItNjEzODJjYTViZjA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Special Agent Leon S.Kennedy goes against his superior's orders and works to destroy a series of biological weapons being used in a war zone in Europe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1753496/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nhatlamsokul"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best resident evil movie yet!!!","reviewBody":"I can't say anything more! it's amazing to me that Capcom and Sony have brought the best movie of the series to all of us, and importantly the fans of the video game. Resident Evil Damnation was a spectacular breakthrough, more interesting and better than RE: Degeneration. The Effect and CG was great to me, it showed the monsters extremely vividly, beautiful slow-motions. You must keep your eyes open all almost 2hrs because of the very-fast rhythm and nice action of Leon and Ada. The noteworthy thing is about the Lickers- fast,many and even they were the good assistants (know while watching!!!???). Dramatic has been pushed up to the climax when Leon and Buddy against 2 giant Tyrans. And that was the 2nd anniversary of Leon when he was getting on the brink of death to save someone (1st in RE Degeneration)!!! Will you have a good day off? So let's buy the DVD or Bluray from 25 Sep. and enjoy it, maybe you'll agree with my reviews. My rating: 9/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20035,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Animation","Action","Horror"],"datePublished":"2012-10-27","keywords":"resident evil,based on game,anime,second part,sequel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Resident Evil: Damnation","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1497283097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIzMGMwNmYtYmJkYy00N2ZjLWIxZjYtNDQyNTc3MDcxMjA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWIzMGMwNmYtYmJkYy00N2ZjLWIxZjYtNDQyNTc3MDcxMjA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Resident Evil: Damnation"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2233310/","name":"Matthew Mercer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1043186/","name":"Dave Wittenberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0283253/","name":"Wendee Lee"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0436780/","name":"Makoto Kamiya"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065386/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052145/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0654565/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1591046/","name":"Shotaro Suga"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586353/","name":"Shinji Mikami"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1306714/","name":"Noboru Sugimura"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Grand Hotel
programme.desc: Španjolska dramska serija usredotočena je na Grand hotel, aristokratsko odmaralište za bogate i moćne s početka 20. stoljeća. Španjolska dramska serija usredotočena je na Grand hotel, aristokratsko odmaralište za bogate i moćne s početka 20. stoljeća, gdje mladić Julio uzima posao kako bi otkrio što se krije iza tajanstvenog nestanka svoje sestre Cristine. Zajedno s kćeri vlasnika hotela susreće se s brojnim tajnama i zajedno otkrivaju mrežu spletki i požude iza luksuzne fasade hotela.

programme.title: SEAL Team
Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"melsmelanosite"},"dateCreated":"2019-04-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Best Military Show Ever","reviewBody":"I am a former Special Forces detachment CDR, and I am just thrilled to see this show. In fact, I don't even like watching TV because it is so superficial sometimes. But this is a must see for everyone at all ages. The details remind me of so many things, down to the cages that look a bit bigger than ours for storing gear and stuff, and the absolutely normal looking CIA gal which is so true to reality. And so much smarter than everyone else ! Even the fast chats of some of the lines that a few reviewers found too fast to understand, is actually true to life. A lot of military people are fast talkers. They think they sound smart if they can say things real fast. That is the culture. But as true as the writing is and as close as the settings and actions are to reality, the feel of the show is the real gem. As an audience we feel what they feel, especially losing people from our lives who gave up on us. This includes the almost automatic drive to jump up and get to duty that is so common in those who act from dedication to this country and saving lives. One of the reviewers said it is good mindless fun. Its okay to not see further than that. It is just fun for some. Not everyone comes to dinner for the same thing. Not everyone wants to take the oath and do the dance, and run the North Island obstacle course over and over until it works. Not everyone wants to feel what it means to really care about putting away bad people to protect good people. But for those who want to know more, this shows what it is like to be a quiet patriot. It shows love of country and family and brotherhood without forcing watchers to put sand in their mouths and wave American flags. And it really does touch on things going on today in each of those countries. It is not all Hollywood. I did the jumps from the C17s. It is cold up there. But some people do jump a little exposed at times. Not everyone covers everything exposed perfectly on every jump. I thank you for reminding me who I am. What a gift you give to anyone who will just watch ! I think when this show stops its run which I hope is a long time from now, each of you involved will remember this as one of the most important projects of your lives. And each of the actors is so good that none of it looks like acting. I salute you all for an incredible job well done. I don't think any other military show can ever come close to this one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21246,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"military,u.s. military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

Not everyone wants to take the oath and do the dance, and run the North Island obstacle course over and over until it works. Not everyone wants to feel what it means to really care about putting away bad people to protect good people. But for those who want to know more, this shows what it is like to be a quiet patriot. It shows love of country and family and brotherhood without forcing watchers to put sand in their mouths and wave American flags. And it really does touch on things going on today in each of those countries. It is not all Hollywood. I did the jumps from the C17s. It is cold up there. What a gift you give to anyone who will just watch ! I think when this show stops its run which I hope is a long time from now, each of you involved will remember this as one of the most important projects of your lives. And each of the actors is so good that none of it looks like acting. I salute you all for an incredible job well done. programme.title: Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: Navy SEAL američka je serija o članovima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne misije boreći se protiv terorizma. Navy SEAL serija je o pripadnicima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne i riskantne misije u koje ih domovina šalje. Njihov je cilj uništiti terorizam, a tim dobro obučenih vojnika suočava se s time svakodnevno.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
Charliejevi anđeli
programme.desc:
Charlie's Angels: Directed by McG. With Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu, Bill Murray. Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0160127/","name":"Charlie's Angels","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGI1NTM5MTItNDcxMS00YTIwLTg1NjUtNzE5ZGE5NDkxMmU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0160127/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tomimt"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Music video entertainment","reviewBody":"Charlies Angels was a semi serious, comedic detective series about three girls, who were working with faceless and mysterious Charlie. And this movie is updated version out of the series, now adding goof ball humour, sex and coolness factor in to the mix.

The angels this time are Cameron Diaz, Lucy Liu and Drew Barrymore. Their boss still is Charlie and his right man Bosley is played by Bill Murray. The plot line goes in the lines of: important software stolen, get it back, who did it. But that matters very little, as the movie has only one aim: to be as cool as it is humanly possible. And when it get tired of being cool it just starts throwing goof ball humor left and right.

I honestly have trouble of reviewing this film as a real movie, as it obviously doesn't even try to be one, but then again what is a real movie. Charlie's Angels is like one huge music video with action and gimmicks in it. The girls are pretty and do throw a couple of great lines and the action is just fine, but the truth is the movie doesn't hold up for multiple viewings. It is a fast food film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":183420,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2001-01-17","keywords":"martial arts,undercover agent,based on tv series,spy,secret agent","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Charlie's Angels","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1029678105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VjNmUxNWQtNzk4ZC00NzE3LThlZDYtODc0YjAwZTA5ODE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VjNmUxNWQtNzk4ZC00NzE3LThlZDYtODc0YjAwZTA5ODE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Charlie's Angels"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005154/","name":"Lucy Liu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629334/","name":"McG"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148520/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089889/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746598/","name":"Ryan Rowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004412/","name":"Ed Solomon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0041864/","name":"John August"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Čovjek budućnosti
programme.desc: Tiger i Wolf odluče da je vrijeme da dr. Kronish umre. Josh nevoljko odluči pomoći. Krene u laboratorij u kojemu naiđe na Jeri, kolegicu koja mu se oduvijek sviđala, i shvati da ona više nije... Tiger i Wolf odluče da je vrijeme da dr. Kronish umre. Josh nevoljko odluči pomoći. Krene u laboratorij u kojemu naiđe na Jeri, kolegicu koja mu se oduvijek sviđala, i shvati da ona više nije Kronisheva partnerica i da tajne istraživanja prodaje Kinezima! Ubiti Kronisha sad nema smisla - njegovo istraživanje je vani. Tiger i Wolf pojave se u laboratoriju. I Biotici. I napadnu Tiger i Wolfa.

programme.title: Čovjek budućnosti
programme.desc: Uslijed katastrofalnog pokušaja da ubiju dr. Kronisha, Tiger i Wolf Josha izbace s misije. Kad shvate da im je njihov uređaj za putovanje kroz vrijeme (TTD/UPV) pokvaren, Josh se nagodi: ako im nabavi... Uslijed katastrofalnog pokušaja da ubiju dr. Kronisha, Tiger i Wolf Josha izbace s misije. Kad shvate da im je njihov uređaj za putovanje kroz vrijeme (TTD/UPV) pokvaren, Josh se nagodi: ako im nabavi još goriva, vratit će ga u ekipu. No pojavio im se novi problem: pucnjava u laboratoriju reaktivirala je policajca koji ih lovi još od 1969. g. Lovi Tiger, Josha i Wolfa!

programme.title: Čovjek budućnosti
programme.desc: Tiger, Wolf i Josh žele uloviti Biotica na božićnoj zabavi Kronish laboratorija kako bi mogli ukrasti vremenski stroj. A to će lako obaviti. Otrovat će slasticu i samo Biotici neće podleći tom otrovu.... Tiger, Wolf i Josh žele uloviti Biotica na božićnoj zabavi Kronish laboratorija kako bi mogli ukrasti vremenski stroj. A to će lako obaviti. Otrovat će slasticu i samo Biotici neće podleći tom otrovu. U međuvremenu, Josh se zbližava sa svojom kolegicom Jeri koja mu pomaže izbjeći opsesivnog policajca koji mu je za petama.

programme.title: Čovjek budućnosti
programme.desc: Imaju samo 27 minuta prije negoli u glavi njihovog uhvaćenoga Biotica eksplodira bomba, Josh, Tiger i Wolf vode važno ispitivanje u Joshevoj spavaćoj sobi dok Joshovi roditelji u prizemlju kuće imaju... Imaju samo 27 minuta prije negoli u glavi njihovog uhvaćenoga Biotica eksplodira bomba, Josh, Tiger i Wolf vode važno ispitivanje u Joshevoj spavaćoj sobi dok Joshovi roditelji u prizemlju kuće imaju božićnu zabavu s nekim susjedima. Josh je u čudu, jer je djevojka u koju je bio zaljubljen zapravo čudovište. A njegova mama silom želi vidjeti tu njegovu novu djevojku. No on poludi na nju kad progura glavu kroz vrata. Hoće li Jeri eksplodirati glava?

IMDb data; ttnr: 6473344, Title: SEAL Team, --- Description: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"melsmelanosite","dateCreated":"2019-04-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Best Military Show Ever","reviewBody":"I am a former Special Forces detachment CDR, and I am just thrilled to see this show. In fact, I don't even like watching TV because it is so superficial sometimes. But this is a must see for everyone at all ages. The details remind me of so many things, down to the cages that look a bit bigger than ours for storing gear and stuff, and the absolutely normal looking CIA gal which is so true to reality. And so much smarter than everyone else ! Even the fast chats of some of the lines that a few reviewers found too fast to understand, is actually true to life. A lot of military people are fast talkers. They think they sound smart if they can say things real fast. That is the culture. But as true as the writing is and as close as the settings and actions are to reality, the feel of the show is the real gem. As an audience we feel what they feel, especially losing people from our lives who gave up on us. This includes the almost automatic drive to jump up and get to duty that is so common in those who act from dedication to this country and saving lives. One of the reviewers said it is good mindless fun. Its okay to not see further than that. It is just fun for some. Not everyone comes to dinner for the same thing. Not everyone wants to take the oath and do the dance, and run the North Island obstacle course over and over until it works. Not everyone wants to feel what it means to really care about putting away bad people to protect good people. But for those who want to know more, this shows what it is like to be a quiet patriot. It shows love of country and family and brotherhood without forcing watchers to put sand in their mouths and wave American flags. And it really does touch on things going on today in each of those countries. It is not all Hollywood. I did the jumps from the C17s. It is cold up there. But some people do jump a little exposed at times. Not everyone covers everything exposed perfectly on every jump. I thank you for reminding me who I am. What a gift you give to anyone who will just watch ! I think when this show stops its run which I hope is a long time from now, each of you involved will remember this as one of the most important projects of your lives. And each of the actors is so good that none of it looks like acting. I salute you all for an incredible job well done. I don't think any other military show can ever come close to this one.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21246,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"military,u.s. military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."</script><metacontent="

In fact, I don't even like watching TV because it is so superficial sometimes. But this is a must see for everyone at all ages. The details remind me of so many things, down to the cages that look a bit bigger than ours for storing gear and stuff, and the absolutely normal looking CIA gal which is so true to reality. And so much smarter than everyone else ! Even the fast chats of some of the lines that a few reviewers found too fast to understand, is actually true to life. A lot of military people are fast talkers. They think they sound smart if they can say things real fast. That is the culture. But as true as the writing is and as close as the settings and actions are to reality, the feel of the show is the real gem. As an audience we feel what they feel, especially losing people from our lives who gave up on us. This includes the almost automatic drive to jump up and get to duty that is so common in those who act from dedication to this country and saving lives. One of the reviewers said it is good mindless fun. Its okay to not see further than that. It is just fun for some. Not everyone comes to dinner for the same thing. It shows love of country and family and brotherhood without forcing watchers to put sand in their mouths and wave American flags. And it really does touch on things going on today in each of those countries. It is not all Hollywood. I did the jumps from the C17s. It is cold up there. What a gift you give to anyone who will just watch ! I think when this show stops its run which I hope is a long time from now, each of you involved will remember this as one of the most important projects of your lives. And each of the actors is so good that none of it looks like acting. I salute you all for an incredible job well done. programme.title: Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: Navy SEAL američka je serija o članovima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne misije boreći se protiv terorizma. Navy SEAL serija je o pripadnicima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne i riskantne misije u koje ih domovina šalje. Njihov je cilj uništiti terorizam, a tim dobro obučenih vojnika suočava se s time svakodnevno.

programme.title: Čovjek budućnosti
programme.desc: Tiger, Wolf i Josh žele uloviti Biotica na božićnoj zabavi Kronish laboratorija kako bi mogli ukrasti vremenski stroj. A to će lako obaviti. Otrovat će slasticu i samo Biotici neće podleći tom otrovu.... Tiger, Wolf i Josh žele uloviti Biotica na božićnoj zabavi Kronish laboratorija kako bi mogli ukrasti vremenski stroj. A to će lako obaviti. Otrovat će slasticu i samo Biotici neće podleći tom otrovu. U međuvremenu, Josh se zbližava sa svojom kolegicom Jeri koja mu pomaže izbjeći opsesivnog policajca koji mu je za petama.

programme.title: Čovjek budućnosti
programme.desc: Imaju samo 27 minuta prije negoli u glavi njihovog uhvaćenoga Biotica eksplodira bomba, Josh, Tiger i Wolf vode važno ispitivanje u Joshevoj spavaćoj sobi dok Joshovi roditelji u prizemlju kuće imaju... Imaju samo 27 minuta prije negoli u glavi njihovog uhvaćenoga Biotica eksplodira bomba, Josh, Tiger i Wolf vode važno ispitivanje u Joshevoj spavaćoj sobi dok Joshovi roditelji u prizemlju kuće imaju božićnu zabavu s nekim susjedima. Josh je u čudu, jer je djevojka u koju je bio zaljubljen zapravo čudovište. A njegova mama silom želi vidjeti tu njegovu novu djevojku. No on poludi na nju kad progura glavu kroz vrata. Hoće li Jeri eksplodirati glava?

programme.title: Čovjek budućnosti
programme.desc: Josh, Tiger i Wolf odu u budućnost, u 2023. g., ukrasti gorivo koje očajnički trebaju da nastave s misijom. Ako ne uspiju, zauvijek će ostati u 2023. g. Ali kad dođu na svoje odredište, suoče se s... Josh, Tiger i Wolf odu u budućnost, u 2023. g., ukrasti gorivo koje očajnički trebaju da nastave s misijom. Ako ne uspiju, zauvijek će ostati u 2023. g. Ali kad dođu na svoje odredište, suoče se s neočekivanim neprijateljem. Tiger je nešto obećala sama sebi: ako dobije potrebne informacije o tome kad je i gdje Kronish rođen, samo će se ona i Wolf vratiti u '50-e i ubiti maloga Kronisha. Josh i dalje ne želi da Kronish umre….

programme.title: Čovjek budućnosti
programme.desc: Na pomolu je završetak misije dok se Tiger i Wolf pripremaju za završni skok u prošlost. Ali kad otmu Joshovu mamu, Josh ne da da Tiger i Wolf odu prije negoli je pokušaju spasiti. Josh odlazi u... Na pomolu je završetak misije dok se Tiger i Wolf pripremaju za završni skok u prošlost. Ali kad otmu Joshovu mamu, Josh ne da da Tiger i Wolf odu prije negoli je pokušaju spasiti. Josh odlazi u Kronishov laboratorij gdje mu se Kronish povjerava. Naime, mogao je birati između napuštanja znanosti i supruge i odlaska na jahtu sa svojim gej ljubavnikom ili ostati i posvetiti se poslu, i ostati u braku bez ljubavi. Žali zbog svoje odluke i upozorava Josha da i on ne odluči krivo. Josh odlazi iz labosa s potrebnim datumima.

programme.title: SEAL Team
Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"melsmelanosite"},"dateCreated":"2019-04-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Best Military Show Ever","reviewBody":"I am a former Special Forces detachment CDR, and I am just thrilled to see this show. In fact, I don't even like watching TV because it is so superficial sometimes. But this is a must see for everyone at all ages. The details remind me of so many things, down to the cages that look a bit bigger than ours for storing gear and stuff, and the absolutely normal looking CIA gal which is so true to reality. And so much smarter than everyone else ! Even the fast chats of some of the lines that a few reviewers found too fast to understand, is actually true to life. A lot of military people are fast talkers. They think they sound smart if they can say things real fast. That is the culture. But as true as the writing is and as close as the settings and actions are to reality, the feel of the show is the real gem. As an audience we feel what they feel, especially losing people from our lives who gave up on us. This includes the almost automatic drive to jump up and get to duty that is so common in those who act from dedication to this country and saving lives. One of the reviewers said it is good mindless fun. Its okay to not see further than that. It is just fun for some. Not everyone comes to dinner for the same thing. Not everyone wants to take the oath and do the dance, and run the North Island obstacle course over and over until it works. Not everyone wants to feel what it means to really care about putting away bad people to protect good people. But for those who want to know more, this shows what it is like to be a quiet patriot. It shows love of country and family and brotherhood without forcing watchers to put sand in their mouths and wave American flags. And it really does touch on things going on today in each of those countries. It is not all Hollywood. I did the jumps from the C17s. It is cold up there. But some people do jump a little exposed at times. Not everyone covers everything exposed perfectly on every jump. I thank you for reminding me who I am. What a gift you give to anyone who will just watch ! I think when this show stops its run which I hope is a long time from now, each of you involved will remember this as one of the most important projects of your lives. And each of the actors is so good that none of it looks like acting. I salute you all for an incredible job well done.
