programme.title: Logan
Logan
programme.desc:
Logan: Directed by James Mangold. With Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen, Boyd Holbrook. In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3315342/","name":"Logan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzc5MTU4N2EtYTkyMi00NjdhLTg3NWEtMTY4OTEyMzJhZTAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3315342/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"trublu215"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"If there was ever a comic book movie deemed worthy of perfect, Logan is it.","reviewBody":"The word 'perfect' is very objective especially when it comes to film. While Logan may not be a perfect film, it is most certainly a perfect comic book film. It is a masterpiece of the most epic proportions and leaves us with a brilliant swan song for producer and star Hugh Jackman in his final outing as Wolverine. The film, directed brilliantly by James Mangold, is a two plus hour comic book fan's wet dream as we see the version of Wolverine every fan has wanted to see for nearly two decades. While many will be very sad to see Jackman step down from the role, he couldn't have picked a better or more satisfying film to end his cinematic legacy with.

The film takes place in 2029 and shows the world in shambles. Mutants are nearly extinct, water is scarce and the world is just an overall wasteland. This is where we find Logan. He is a limo driving cantankerous caretaker to an even more cantankerous Professor X, who is now suffering from dementia and seizures. He is a borderline alcoholic suffering from a mysterious illness that limits his mutant abilities. Due to this, he lives this quiet life until he meets a young girl who he feels he must protect. Without giving too much away, there is much more here than I can go into but I will say, if you are a fan of the Wolverine comics, this film will bring a tear to your eye. This is probably the most faithful adaptation of a comic book character EVER, Marvel and DC combined. The way the story goes, the way Logan behaves, the selflessness and the rage, this is an all around realized version of this character. While it may have taken a little longer than it should have, this film was worth the wait. James Mangold does a fantastic job at creating the world Logan knows now. This is more of a film like Mangold's 3:10 to Yuma. It is bleak, violent and absolutely heartbreaking. This is far from the PG-13 character we're used to. This is a foul mouthed, miserable and very VERY bloody rendition of the source material. This is a film very much like The Guantlet or Badlands, a crime thriller and on-the-road drama. It very much embodies the look and feel of a film from the mid-70s and it plays to this very well. 

The performances in this film are amazing. Hugh Jackman's performance here is the best as the character and may be one of the best of his career. He is miserable and broken in this film and to see him like this as the character, it is bittersweet especially because Jackman has been so attached to this role. If he hurts, we hurt. If he's mad, we're mad. It is a true testament to Jackman as an actor to make his audience feel this connected to someone who is, by traditional standards, completely unrelateable. Boyd Holbrook brings a sinister performance to this and continues to build a very impressive resume. Holbrook is someone who you'll love to hate. The real standout performance here is from Dafne Keen who plays Laura. Without giving away any spoilers, she is BADASS in this film and even gives Logan a run for his money on the brutality.

Overall, Logan is a perfect comic book adaptation that is as heartbreaking as it is visually stunning. Mangold and Jackman create a special film with this that should be talked about for years to come. Believe the hype, Logan is a seriously amazing comic book film that just may be the best ever made and embodies the definition of a perfect adaptation.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":702453,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2017-03-03","keywords":"marvel comics,x men,superhero,mutant,north dakota","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Super Bowl Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1946727961","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU3NmY1NTktOTY5NC00NzY0LTk1YzUtYzBmYWFhNDhiMDM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU3NmY1NTktOTY5NC00NzY0LTk1YzUtYzBmYWFhNDhiMDM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the Super Bowl Spot for 'Logan.'"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413168/","name":"Hugh Jackman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001772/","name":"Patrick Stewart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6748436/","name":"Dafne Keen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003506/","name":"James Mangold"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003506/","name":"James Mangold"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0291082/","name":"Scott Frank"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338169/","name":"Michael Green"}],"duration":"PT2H17M"}</script><metacontent="

But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3315342/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"trublu215","dateCreated":"2017-02-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"If there was ever a comic book movie deemed worthy of perfect, Logan is it.","reviewBody":"The word 'perfect' is very objective especially when it comes to film. The film, directed brilliantly by James Mangold, is a two plus hour comic book fan's wet dream as we see the version of Wolverine every fan has wanted to see for nearly two decades. While many will be very sad to see Jackman step down from the role, he couldn't have picked a better or more satisfying film to end his cinematic legacy with.

This is probably the most faithful adaptation of a comic book character EVER, Marvel and DC combined. The way the story goes, the way Logan behaves, the selflessness and the rage, this is an all around realized version of this character. While it may have taken a little longer than it should have, this film was worth the wait. James Mangold does a fantastic job at creating the world Logan knows now. This is more of a film like Mangold's 3:10 to Yuma. It is bleak, violent and absolutely heartbreaking. This is far from the PG-13 character we're used to. This is a foul mouthed, miserable and very VERY bloody rendition of the source material. This is a film very much like The Guantlet or Badlands, a crime thriller and on-the-road drama. It very much embodies the look and feel of a film from the mid-70s and it plays to this very well. 

The performances in this film are amazing. Hugh Jackman's performance here is the best as the character and may be one of the best of his career. He is miserable and broken in this film and to see him like this as the character, it is bittersweet especially because Jackman has been so attached to this role. If he hurts, we hurt. If he's mad, we're mad. It is a true testament to Jackman as an actor to make his audience feel this connected to someone who is, by traditional standards, completely unrelateable. Boyd Holbrook brings a sinister performance to this and continues to build a very impressive resume. Holbrook is someone who you'll love to hate. The real standout performance here is from Dafne Keen who plays Laura. Without giving away any spoilers, she is BADASS in this film and even gives Logan a run for his money on the brutality.

Overall, Logan is a perfect comic book adaptation that is as heartbreaking as it is visually stunning. Mangold and Jackman create a special film with this that should be talked about for years to come. Believe the hype, Logan is a seriously amazing comic book film that just may be the best ever made and embodies the definition of a perfect adaptation.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":702453,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2017-03-03","keywords":"marvel comics,x men,superhero,mutant,north dakota","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Super Bowl Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1946727961","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU3NmY1NTktOTY5NC00NzY0LTk1YzUtYzBmYWFhNDhiMDM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU3NmY1NTktOTY5NC00NzY0LTk1YzUtYzBmYWFhNDhiMDM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the Super Bowl Spot for 'Logan.'","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413168/","name":"Hugh Jackman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001772/","name":"Patrick Stewart","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6748436/","name":"Dafne Keen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003506/","name":"James Mangold"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003506/","name":"James Mangold","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0291082/","name":"Scott Frank","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338169/","name":"Michael Green"],"duration":"PT2H17M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Scenic Route
U pustinji
programme.desc: Scenic Route: Directed by Kevin Goetz, Michael Goetz. With Josh Duhamel, Dan Fogler, Peter Michael Goetz, Christie Burson. Tensions rise between lifelong friends Mitchell and Carter after their truck breaks down on an isolated desert road as they start to attack each other's life decisions with unwavering brutality." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2012011/","name":"Scenic Route","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyNjIyOTU0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwOTI2OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Tensions rise between lifelong friends Mitchell and Carter after their truck breaks down on an isolated desert road as they start to attack each other's life decisions with unwavering brutality.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2012011/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"preemptiveselfdefense"},"dateCreated":"2013-07-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Damn good","reviewBody":"This was a great movie. Dan Fogler in a drama threw me but I've always liked the other guy, even though he usually does rom-com stuff that doesn't appeal to me. Very good all around. Plot summary bears some similarities to Gerry, I think it was called (Matt Damon, Casey Affleck) but waaaay less boring. A couple times during the film I thought I had sorta "figured it out" and decided I wasn't liking it, but w/in 10mins it changed my mind again. Being fundamentally a one-setting movie wasn't a problem/didn't get bored. The actors carry this thing very well and are very believable. I'm not one of those people (and damn, there's sooo many) that try and like "solve" movies while they're watching them. I don't wonder whether the butler did it or not because I'm still watching the movie and why spoil it for myself? I did slightly anticipate a few things but only a minute or two before events would unfold. It will trick you, shock you, impress you, do all the good things a good movie should. I did find the initial dialogue/argument that kicks things off slightly forced on Foglers part but oh well, didn't know the characters yet. Makes sense in retrospect. The ending was great for me. Thought it wasn't going to sit well but Josh Duhamel sells it just w/the look in his eyes (I feel somewhat lame saying that but it's true). Many who got all booty-hurt about Inception will pop up again after this but I think it ended just right, which is a rare enough thing these days (as is being well done and at times surprising. And a relatively fresh idea to boot). I feel that this movie wants you to get some perspective and appreciate your life and what you have, since many of us get stuck thinking about what we lack (quite natural given the pain in the posterior that life is for most people). You should watch it. Definitely worth your time","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10715,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2013-08-23","keywords":"redneck,desert,on the road,cell phone,fox","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2924652057","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgwMzMxMjMxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjkxMjM2OQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgwMzMxMjMxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjkxMjM2OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Mitchell and Carter, life-long friends who have drifted apart, are on a road trip when their old pickup breaks down, leaving them stranded on an isolated desert road. Nobody can pick apart a man like his best friend, and as the relentless elements of the desert grind them down, they start to attack each otherÂ’s life decisions with unwavering brutality. As they question who they are and who they could have been, their agitation leads to physical confrontation and ultimately knife-wielding madness, and what begins as an inconvenience becomes a very real life or death struggle."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0241049/","name":"Josh Duhamel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0283945/","name":"Dan Fogler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2829954/","name":"Miracle Laurie"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0324521/","name":"Kevin Goetz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1603397/","name":"Michael Goetz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017525/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0302468/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3189831/","name":"Kyle Killen"}],"duration":"PT1H22M"}</script><metacontent="

Tensions rise between lifelong friends Mitchell and Carter after their truck breaks down on an isolated desert road as they start to attack each other's life decisions with unwavering brutality." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2012011/","name":"Scenic Route","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyNjIyOTU0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwOTI2OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Tensions rise between lifelong friends Mitchell and Carter after their truck breaks down on an isolated desert road as they start to attack each other's life decisions with unwavering brutality.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2012011/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"preemptiveselfdefense","dateCreated":"2013-07-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Damn good","reviewBody":"This was a great movie. Dan Fogler in a drama threw me but I've always liked the other guy, even though he usually does rom-com stuff that doesn't appeal to me. Very good all around. Plot summary bears some similarities to Gerry, I think it was called (Matt Damon, Casey Affleck) but waaaay less boring. A couple times during the film I thought I had sorta "figured it out" and decided I wasn't liking it, but w/in 10mins it changed my mind again. Being fundamentally a one-setting movie wasn't a problem/didn't get bored. The actors carry this thing very well and are very believable. I'm not one of those people (and damn, there's sooo many) that try and like "solve" movies while they're watching them. I don't wonder whether the butler did it or not because I'm still watching the movie and why spoil it for myself? I did slightly anticipate a few things but only a minute or two before events would unfold. It will trick you, shock you, impress you, do all the good things a good movie should. I did find the initial dialogue/argument that kicks things off slightly forced on Foglers part but oh well, didn't know the characters yet. Makes sense in retrospect. The ending was great for me. Thought it wasn't going to sit well but Josh Duhamel sells it just w/the look in his eyes (I feel somewhat lame saying that but it's true). Many who got all booty-hurt about Inception will pop up again after this but I think it ended just right, which is a rare enough thing these days (as is being well done and at times surprising. And a relatively fresh idea to boot). I feel that this movie wants you to get some perspective and appreciate your life and what you have, since many of us get stuck thinking about what we lack (quite natural given the pain in the posterior that life is for most people). You should watch it. programme.title: Notes on a Scandal
Beleške o skandalu
programme.desc: Notes on a Scandal: Directed by Richard Eyre. With Judi Dench, Cate Blanchett, Tom Georgeson, Michael Maloney. A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her fifteen-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond a platonic friendship." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0465551/","name":"Notes on a Scandal","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTgyOWQ4ZTUtMmQ0ZS00M2MxLThhMTctODBjMGVmNzMwYTFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQyMDgzOTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her fifteen-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond a platonic friendship.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0465551/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"julianjessop"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Even better than the book","reviewBody":"I saw this at a preview last night. It is a brilliant, absorbing little piece from Zoe Heller's novel about a teacher (Cate Blanchett, looking stunning) who has an affair with a 15 year old pupil and the effect this has on her relationship with a bitter, older teacher seeking selfishly for love (Judy Dench, looking 100). Great performances all round, with special mention to Bill Nighy in the Bill Nighy role. The script (Patrick Marber) is faithful to the book but enjoyable though the book was the film is actually - for a change - even better. Beautifully filmed in North London and Eastbourne (presumably the school scenes) this movie is definitely a must see.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76986,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-02-28","keywords":"sex with a minor,teacher student relationship,older woman younger man relationship,sex with teacher,teacher","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Notes on a Scandal","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1419641113","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGVjYzY3NzItYWRlMS00MTYyLWE4NGQtN2YwNzJiNTBlZjI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGVjYzY3NzItYWRlMS00MTYyLWE4NGQtN2YwNzJiNTBlZjI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Fox Searchlight Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000949/","name":"Cate Blanchett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001132/","name":"Judi Dench"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1587166/","name":"Andrew Simpson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264236/","name":"Richard Eyre"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028932/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103974/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0104811/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0544999/","name":"Patrick Marber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0375398/","name":"Zoë Heller"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her fifteen-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond a platonic friendship." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0465551/","name":"Notes on a Scandal","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTgyOWQ4ZTUtMmQ0ZS00M2MxLThhMTctODBjMGVmNzMwYTFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQyMDgzOTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her fifteen-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond a platonic friendship.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0465551/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"julianjessop","dateCreated":"2007-01-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Even better than the book","reviewBody":"I saw this at a preview last night. It is a brilliant, absorbing little piece from Zoe Heller's novel about a teacher (Cate Blanchett, looking stunning) who has an affair with a 15 year old pupil and the effect this has on her relationship with a bitter, older teacher seeking selfishly for love (Judy Dench, looking 100). Great performances all round, with special mention to Bill Nighy in the Bill Nighy role. The script (Patrick Marber) is faithful to the book but enjoyable though the book was the film is actually - for a change - even better. Beautifully filmed in North London and Eastbourne (presumably the school scenes) this movie is definitely a must see.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76986,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-02-28","keywords":"sex with a minor,teacher student relationship,older woman younger man relationship,sex with teacher,teacher","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Notes on a Scandal","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1419641113","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGVjYzY3NzItYWRlMS00MTYyLWE4NGQtN2YwNzJiNTBlZjI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGVjYzY3NzItYWRlMS00MTYyLWE4NGQtN2YwNzJiNTBlZjI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Fox Searchlight Pictures","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000949/","name":"Cate Blanchett","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001132/","name":"Judi Dench","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1587166/","name":"Andrew Simpson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264236/","name":"Richard Eyre"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028932/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103974/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0104811/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0544999/","name":"Patrick Marber","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0375398/","name":"Zoë Heller"],"duration":"PT1H32M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Taking Lives
Uzimanje života
programme.desc: Taking Lives: Directed by D.J. Caruso. With Angelina Jolie, Ethan Hawke, Kiefer Sutherland, Gena Rowlands. An FBI profiler is called in by French Canadian police to catch a serial killer who takes on the identity of each new victim." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0364045/","name":"Taking Lives","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA3NDMyNzI5NTdeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDQxNDEyMzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"An FBI profiler is called in by French Canadian police to catch a serial killer who takes on the identity of each new victim.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0364045/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tburke85"},"dateCreated":"2009-06-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Taking Lives Entertaining But Predictable","reviewBody":"Taking Lives is entertaining but predictable from director D.J. Caruso whose admirable in making this thriller but there are flaws that weigh it down. Angelina Jolie and Ethan Hawke are good as the two leads. Oliver Martinez, Tcheky Karyo, Jean-Hugh Anglade, and Gena Rowlands are effective as the supporting characters but they lack screen time and development because most of the focus is on Jolie. Kiefer Sutherland is solid in a brief extended appearance before being written out of the movie rather quickly. The rest of the cast are okay in their roles but no one stands out. The movie does have a little suspense but it doesn't pay off because the eventual twist I sort of saw coming. There's a little action including a chase that's well executed but the movie could've used more of it. If there was more suspense, action, character development, and a different twist besides the one they went with the film would've have been that bad. Taking Lives starts off decent but after a while it becomes kind of obvious who the killer is and after the reveal there's no more suspense. The pacing was a little slow at times which didn't help either. Lucikly Caruos kept the running time down to 103 minutes so it's not a total waste of time. Overall despite it's flaws Taking Lives is an okay thriller with a little suspense, action, and solid performances by the cast who make this movie worth watching at least once but after it's over you can't help but feel a little disappointed.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":87517,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2004-04-28","keywords":"fake identity,serial killer,female agent,stolen identity,criminal investigation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Taking Lives","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi92799257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGJlZTI3NzktMDgzZS00Nzk1LWFlODMtNjc5ODUxMjBmYmIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGJlZTI3NzktMDgzZS00Nzk1LWFlODMtNjc5ODUxMjBmYmIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000662/","name":"Kiefer Sutherland"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0142286/","name":"D.J. Caruso"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108864/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014103/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1373865/","name":"Michael Pye"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092578/","name":"Jon Bokenkamp"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0364045, Title: Taking Lives, --- Description: Taking Lives: Directed by D.J. Caruso. With Angelina Jolie, Ethan Hawke, Kiefer Sutherland, Gena Rowlands. An FBI profiler is called in by French Canadian police to catch a serial killer who takes on the identity of each new victim." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0364045/","name":"Taking Lives","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA3NDMyNzI5NTdeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDQxNDEyMzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"An FBI profiler is called in by French Canadian police to catch a serial killer who takes on the identity of each new victim.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0364045/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"tburke85","dateCreated":"2009-06-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Taking Lives Entertaining But Predictable","reviewBody":"Taking Lives is entertaining but predictable from director D.J. Caruso whose admirable in making this thriller but there are flaws that weigh it down. Angelina Jolie and Ethan Hawke are good as the two leads. Oliver Martinez, Tcheky Karyo, Jean-Hugh Anglade, and Gena Rowlands are effective as the supporting characters but they lack screen time and development because most of the focus is on Jolie. Kiefer Sutherland is solid in a brief extended appearance before being written out of the movie rather quickly. The rest of the cast are okay in their roles but no one stands out. The movie does have a little suspense but it doesn't pay off because the eventual twist I sort of saw coming. There's a little action including a chase that's well executed but the movie could've used more of it. If there was more suspense, action, character development, and a different twist besides the one they went with the film would've have been that bad. Taking Lives starts off decent but after a while it becomes kind of obvious who the killer is and after the reveal there's no more suspense. The pacing was a little slow at times which didn't help either. Lucikly Caruos kept the running time down to 103 minutes so it's not a total waste of time. Overall despite it's flaws Taking Lives is an okay thriller with a little suspense, action, and solid performances by the cast who make this movie worth watching at least once but after it's over you can't help but feel a little disappointed.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":87517,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2004-04-28","keywords":"fake identity,serial killer,female agent,stolen identity,criminal investigation","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Taking Lives","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi92799257","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGJlZTI3NzktMDgzZS00Nzk1LWFlODMtNjc5ODUxMjBmYmIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGJlZTI3NzktMDgzZS00Nzk1LWFlODMtNjc5ODUxMjBmYmIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000662/","name":"Kiefer Sutherland"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0142286/","name":"D.J. programme.title: A Perfect Getaway
Savršeno bekstvo
programme.desc: A Perfect Getaway: Directed by David Twohy. With Steve Zahn, Timothy Olyphant, Milla Jovovich, Kiele Sanchez. Two pairs of lovers on a Hawaiian vacation discover that psychopaths are stalking and murdering tourists on the islands." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0971209/","name":"A Perfect Getaway","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3NzcxNzAwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTgyNDU2Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two pairs of lovers on a Hawaiian vacation discover that psychopaths are stalking and murdering tourists on the islands.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0971209/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"judecas"},"dateCreated":"2009-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nice, but with disturbing character inconsistency","reviewBody":"First the pros - 99% of the movie was shot in daylight in the beautiful Hawaiian nature, really relaxing to the eyes. Good cast, good acting overall. Interesting story, which actually pulled my attention and made me watch the movie. The promised twist was there and was a big one, but more about it in cons... Cons - Well, the promised "twist" was a huge and unexpected one. So unexpected it was really difficult to believe. It made me wondering like "Wow, wait a minute! Weren't they doing this and this a few minutes ago? Didn't they tell this and this? Ehmmm.... they actually did, so what the...?" The script wasn't really finished (well) IMHO, it made me feel like the story was born during writing the script, but after finishing it there was no time/will to rework the beginning and synchronize it with the end. This made the lead characters really inconsistent and left me quiet unsatisfied after the movie ended, even if I have to say the final action sequence was good enough.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":70988,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-01-13","keywords":"newlywed,hawaii,tourist,murder,honeymoon","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Perfect Getaway","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3565879833","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyMDU2MzIyMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDgzMzI2Mg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyMDU2MzIyMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDgzMzI2Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two couples on an Hawaiian vacation discover that psychopaths are stalking and murdering tourists on the islands."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000170/","name":"Milla Jovovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001872/","name":"Steve Zahn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0648249/","name":"Timothy Olyphant"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878638/","name":"David Twohy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0311504/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0178111/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878638/","name":"David Twohy"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Beyond the Law
Izvan zakona
programme.desc:
Beyond the Law: Directed by Larry Ferguson. With Charlie Sheen, Linda Fiorentino, Michael Madsen, Courtney B. Vance. An undercover cop joins a murderous, arms-dealing biker gang to try to put them behind bars." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0103805/","name":"Beyond the Law","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MDQxNTkxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzYzMzgxMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An undercover cop joins a murderous, arms-dealing biker gang to try to put them behind bars.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0103805/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"philtbautista"},"dateCreated":"2017-06-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Behind the Scenes - Working with Charlie Sheen","reviewBody":"It was fun making this movie with Charlie as his stand-in again (did the same for Hot Shots!). Shooting it in reverse (long hair first, then short hair scenes later), sitting next to him with his pearl handled matching 45's he asks me "What do you think of this Movie, Phil?". He was always very nice and cordial to me. When I went back to the production office one day (me with long hair and him with short hair) he passes me (after shooting for days with both of us in long hair) and says "How's it going, Phil?". I didn't recognize him! 

Shooting the scenes for the "Sonora" bike run were intense! We had one of the leading outlaw motorcycle gangs respond to our casting call and they spent the night on location so they could be in the front of the pack. Lots of other extras as bikers ("Weekend Warriors" - aka Lawyers, Engineers etc. all dressed out on their shiny HD's and brand new leather!), also showed up (took their place behind the Gang). I worked Security that day (no need for a stand-in if the Actor isn't on set), and had a few "extra" bikers come riding past me to get off the set saying they were afraid of or had been threatened by the Gang members. Probably mouthed off to some of the Gang! 

A fun group to work with including Reno Thunder (Native American) who I miss today! The quintessential "Native". We did the "Jail" scene next to each other over and over and over! As I said, Charlie (and Linda) were very kind and nice to me. Great to work with/for.

Phil Bautista, Austin TX","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6693,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1993-04-22","keywords":"female nudity,male nudity,sex on first date,arizona desert,arizona","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3152069401","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM0ZWQ4M2ItNDQzZC00NjVlLWIwMmYtZTY2NDcwZDNlMGIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM0ZWQ4M2ItNDQzZC00NjVlLWIwMmYtZTY2NDcwZDNlMGIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"An undercover cop joins a murderous, arms-dealing biker gang to try to put them behind bars."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000221/","name":"Charlie Sheen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000400/","name":"Linda Fiorentino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000514/","name":"Michael Madsen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272511/","name":"Larry Ferguson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060324/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000020/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272511/","name":"Larry Ferguson"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Toy Soldiers
Olovni vojnici
programme.desc:
Toy Soldiers: Directed by Daniel Petrie Jr.. With Sean Astin, Wil Wheaton, Keith Coogan, Andrew Divoff. A group of troublemaking boys decide to take a stand when terrorists seize control of their boarding school." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0103112/","name":"Toy Soldiers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTk0NGNiYTctYWE5NS00YzdkLWI1N2YtYWI5YTk2MmI5NzU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzEyNjE5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of troublemaking boys decide to take a stand when terrorists seize control of their boarding school.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0103112/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Megn1"},"dateCreated":"2005-10-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Quite simply one of the most enjoyable b-movies from the 90's.","reviewBody":"This is one of the best "Bloke" movies from the early 90's and whilst slightly dated, its one of those movies that would never get made today, which makes it very special! In fact, a very similar movie was made in the 90's called "Masterminds" and it was a PG variation on the same theme, but it was nowhere near as fun or realistic for that matter.

So what's so special about this film? It's the comradre between the main characters and the against all odds theme of the film. Sean Astin is very likable and has starred in some of the most memorable films of the 80/90's, particularly "The Goonies". He also went onto greater things with "Rudy" and "The Lord of the Rings" Trilogy, but "Encino Man" is a good trip down memory lane. Will Wheaton from "Stand by Me" lends nice support to the film and Andrew Divoff is a terrific villain. Louis Gossett Jr sleepwalks in his role, but he does add some brevity to the film, particularly his relationship with Astin's rebellious nature.

So how's the action? By today's standards, it's rather tedious and cheap looking, almost like a TV movie, but the production values are good and the violence is actually quite nasty for a film involving school students. However, the director makes up for the limited budget with some nicely suspenseful moments and well placed humor.

So park your brain at the door and enjoy this fondly remembered action flick, but don't expect Oscar material!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":22467,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1991-04-26","keywords":"terrorist,hostage,boarding school,student,headmaster","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Toy Soldiers","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi704577817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDdjZDJjZjQtOWZiYS00ZTI5LWI1MjEtMDMwYWFmYmYwZDdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDdjZDJjZjQtOWZiYS00ZTI5LWI1MjEtMDMwYWFmYmYwZDdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"HV-post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000276/","name":"Sean Astin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000696/","name":"Wil Wheaton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176861/","name":"Keith Coogan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677943/","name":"Daniel Petrie Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049958/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0448388/","name":"William P. Kennedy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677943/","name":"Daniel Petrie Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Perfect Getaway
Savršeno bekstvo
programme.desc: A Perfect Getaway: Directed by David Twohy. With Steve Zahn, Timothy Olyphant, Milla Jovovich, Kiele Sanchez. Two pairs of lovers on a Hawaiian vacation discover that psychopaths are stalking and murdering tourists on the islands." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0971209/","name":"A Perfect Getaway","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA3NzcxNzAwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTgyNDU2Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two pairs of lovers on a Hawaiian vacation discover that psychopaths are stalking and murdering tourists on the islands.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0971209/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"judecas"},"dateCreated":"2009-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nice, but with disturbing character inconsistency","reviewBody":"First the pros - 99% of the movie was shot in daylight in the beautiful Hawaiian nature, really relaxing to the eyes. Good cast, good acting overall. Interesting story, which actually pulled my attention and made me watch the movie. The promised twist was there and was a big one, but more about it in cons... Cons - Well, the promised "twist" was a huge and unexpected one. So unexpected it was really difficult to believe. It made me wondering like "Wow, wait a minute! Weren't they doing this and this a few minutes ago? Didn't they tell this and this? Ehmmm.... they actually did, so what the...?" The script wasn't really finished (well) IMHO, it made me feel like the story was born during writing the script, but after finishing it there was no time/will to rework the beginning and synchronize it with the end. This made the lead characters really inconsistent and left me quiet unsatisfied after the movie ended, even if I have to say the final action sequence was good enough.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":70988,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-01-13","keywords":"newlywed,hawaii,tourist,murder,honeymoon","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Perfect Getaway","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3565879833","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyMDU2MzIyMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDgzMzI2Mg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyMDU2MzIyMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDgzMzI2Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two couples on an Hawaiian vacation discover that psychopaths are stalking and murdering tourists on the islands."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000170/","name":"Milla Jovovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001872/","name":"Steve Zahn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0648249/","name":"Timothy Olyphant"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878638/","name":"David Twohy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0311504/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0178111/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878638/","name":"David Twohy"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Beyond the Law
Izvan zakona
programme.desc:
Beyond the Law: Directed by Larry Ferguson. With Charlie Sheen, Linda Fiorentino, Michael Madsen, Courtney B. Vance. An undercover cop joins a murderous, arms-dealing biker gang to try to put them behind bars." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0103805/","name":"Beyond the Law","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MDQxNTkxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzYzMzgxMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An undercover cop joins a murderous, arms-dealing biker gang to try to put them behind bars.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0103805/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"philtbautista"},"dateCreated":"2017-06-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Behind the Scenes - Working with Charlie Sheen","reviewBody":"It was fun making this movie with Charlie as his stand-in again (did the same for Hot Shots!). Shooting it in reverse (long hair first, then short hair scenes later), sitting next to him with his pearl handled matching 45's he asks me "What do you think of this Movie, Phil?". He was always very nice and cordial to me. When I went back to the production office one day (me with long hair and him with short hair) he passes me (after shooting for days with both of us in long hair) and says "How's it going, Phil?". I didn't recognize him! 

Shooting the scenes for the "Sonora" bike run were intense! We had one of the leading outlaw motorcycle gangs respond to our casting call and they spent the night on location so they could be in the front of the pack. Lots of other extras as bikers ("Weekend Warriors" - aka Lawyers, Engineers etc. all dressed out on their shiny HD's and brand new leather!), also showed up (took their place behind the Gang). I worked Security that day (no need for a stand-in if the Actor isn't on set), and had a few "extra" bikers come riding past me to get off the set saying they were afraid of or had been threatened by the Gang members. Probably mouthed off to some of the Gang! 

A fun group to work with including Reno Thunder (Native American) who I miss today! The quintessential "Native". We did the "Jail" scene next to each other over and over and over! As I said, Charlie (and Linda) were very kind and nice to me. Great to work with/for.

Phil Bautista, Austin TX","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6693,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1993-04-22","keywords":"female nudity,male nudity,sex on first date,arizona desert,arizona","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3152069401","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM0ZWQ4M2ItNDQzZC00NjVlLWIwMmYtZTY2NDcwZDNlMGIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM0ZWQ4M2ItNDQzZC00NjVlLWIwMmYtZTY2NDcwZDNlMGIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"An undercover cop joins a murderous, arms-dealing biker gang to try to put them behind bars."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000221/","name":"Charlie Sheen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000400/","name":"Linda Fiorentino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000514/","name":"Michael Madsen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272511/","name":"Larry Ferguson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060324/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000020/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272511/","name":"Larry Ferguson"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Toy Soldiers
Olovni vojnici
programme.desc:
Toy Soldiers: Directed by Daniel Petrie Jr.. With Sean Astin, Wil Wheaton, Keith Coogan, Andrew Divoff. A group of troublemaking boys decide to take a stand when terrorists seize control of their boarding school." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0103112/","name":"Toy Soldiers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTk0NGNiYTctYWE5NS00YzdkLWI1N2YtYWI5YTk2MmI5NzU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzEyNjE5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of troublemaking boys decide to take a stand when terrorists seize control of their boarding school.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0103112/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Megn1"},"dateCreated":"2005-10-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Quite simply one of the most enjoyable b-movies from the 90's.","reviewBody":"This is one of the best "Bloke" movies from the early 90's and whilst slightly dated, its one of those movies that would never get made today, which makes it very special! In fact, a very similar movie was made in the 90's called "Masterminds" and it was a PG variation on the same theme, but it was nowhere near as fun or realistic for that matter.

So what's so special about this film? It's the comradre between the main characters and the against all odds theme of the film. Sean Astin is very likable and has starred in some of the most memorable films of the 80/90's, particularly "The Goonies". He also went onto greater things with "Rudy" and "The Lord of the Rings" Trilogy, but "Encino Man" is a good trip down memory lane. Will Wheaton from "Stand by Me" lends nice support to the film and Andrew Divoff is a terrific villain. Louis Gossett Jr sleepwalks in his role, but he does add some brevity to the film, particularly his relationship with Astin's rebellious nature.

So how's the action? By today's standards, it's rather tedious and cheap looking, almost like a TV movie, but the production values are good and the violence is actually quite nasty for a film involving school students. However, the director makes up for the limited budget with some nicely suspenseful moments and well placed humor.

So park your brain at the door and enjoy this fondly remembered action flick, but don't expect Oscar material!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":22467,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1991-04-26","keywords":"terrorist,hostage,boarding school,student,headmaster","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Toy Soldiers","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi704577817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDdjZDJjZjQtOWZiYS00ZTI5LWI1MjEtMDMwYWFmYmYwZDdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDdjZDJjZjQtOWZiYS00ZTI5LWI1MjEtMDMwYWFmYmYwZDdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"HV-post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000276/","name":"Sean Astin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000696/","name":"Wil Wheaton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176861/","name":"Keith Coogan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677943/","name":"Daniel Petrie Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049958/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0448388/","name":"William P. Kennedy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677943/","name":"Daniel Petrie Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

By today's standards, it's rather tedious and cheap looking, almost like a TV movie, but the production values are good and the violence is actually quite nasty for a film involving school students. However, the director makes up for the limited budget with some nicely suspenseful moments and well placed humor.

So park your brain at the door and enjoy this fondly remembered action flick, but don't expect Oscar material!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":22467,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1991-04-26","keywords":"terrorist,hostage,boarding school,student,headmaster","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Toy Soldiers","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi704577817","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDdjZDJjZjQtOWZiYS00ZTI5LWI1MjEtMDMwYWFmYmYwZDdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDdjZDJjZjQtOWZiYS00ZTI5LWI1MjEtMDMwYWFmYmYwZDdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"HV-post","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000276/","name":"Sean Astin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000696/","name":"Wil Wheaton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176861/","name":"Keith Coogan"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677943/","name":"Daniel Petrie Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049958/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0448388/","name":"William P. programme.title: Taking Lives
Uzimanje života
programme.desc: Taking Lives: Directed by D.J. Caruso. With Angelina Jolie, Ethan Hawke, Kiefer Sutherland, Gena Rowlands. An FBI profiler is called in by French Canadian police to catch a serial killer who takes on the identity of each new victim." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0364045/","name":"Taking Lives","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA3NDMyNzI5NTdeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDQxNDEyMzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"An FBI profiler is called in by French Canadian police to catch a serial killer who takes on the identity of each new victim.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0364045/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tburke85"},"dateCreated":"2009-06-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Taking Lives Entertaining But Predictable","reviewBody":"Taking Lives is entertaining but predictable from director D.J. Caruso whose admirable in making this thriller but there are flaws that weigh it down. Angelina Jolie and Ethan Hawke are good as the two leads. Oliver Martinez, Tcheky Karyo, Jean-Hugh Anglade, and Gena Rowlands are effective as the supporting characters but they lack screen time and development because most of the focus is on Jolie. Kiefer Sutherland is solid in a brief extended appearance before being written out of the movie rather quickly. The rest of the cast are okay in their roles but no one stands out. The movie does have a little suspense but it doesn't pay off because the eventual twist I sort of saw coming. There's a little action including a chase that's well executed but the movie could've used more of it. If there was more suspense, action, character development, and a different twist besides the one they went with the film would've have been that bad. Taking Lives starts off decent but after a while it becomes kind of obvious who the killer is and after the reveal there's no more suspense. The pacing was a little slow at times which didn't help either. Lucikly Caruos kept the running time down to 103 minutes so it's not a total waste of time. Overall despite it's flaws Taking Lives is an okay thriller with a little suspense, action, and solid performances by the cast who make this movie worth watching at least once but after it's over you can't help but feel a little disappointed.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":87517,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2004-04-28","keywords":"fake identity,serial killer,female agent,stolen identity,criminal investigation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Taking Lives","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi92799257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGJlZTI3NzktMDgzZS00Nzk1LWFlODMtNjc5ODUxMjBmYmIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGJlZTI3NzktMDgzZS00Nzk1LWFlODMtNjc5ODUxMjBmYmIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000662/","name":"Kiefer Sutherland"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0142286/","name":"D.J. programme.desc: Rising Sun: Directed by Philip Kaufman. With Sean Connery, Wesley Snipes, Harvey Keitel, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa. When an escort girl is found dead in the offices of a Japanese company in Los Angeles, detectives Web Smith and John Connor act as liaison between the company's executives and the investigating cop Tom Graham." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0107969/","name":"Rising Sun","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTVkMGUwN2UtZjI4MS00YWU0LWI2NjAtOTc1MmMzMzkxZTUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"When an escort girl is found dead in the offices of a Japanese company in Los Angeles, detectives Web Smith and John Connor act as liaison between the company's executives and the investigating cop Tom Graham.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0107969/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2007-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Mystery killing with politics background about East-West confrontation","reviewBody":"The background of the film is the American-Japonese business competition in L.A. where a cop (Wesley Snipes) accused by corruption teams up with old man (Sean Connery) , expert on Japanese world . They're investigating a killing case filmed in videotape recording and located at an important corporation run by powerful manager (Mako)and it implicates a senator (Ray Wise) . The homicide is committed on a boardroom table while a beautiful prostitute is strangled when having sex with her lover , being prime suspect a Japanese executive (Gary -Hiroyuki Tagawa). The identity of the murderer is taken by a security camera on a missing disk . Meantime , another tough police( Harvey Keitel) is also investigating and they're helped by a gorgeous video expert (Tia Carrere). Soon discover on the final breaking point that even the truth can lie .\n\nThe tale mingles suspense , thriller , mystery , quick action , buddy movie and is quite entertaining . However , the complicated script contains some flaws and gaps , originating fails on credibility but gets its nice moments here and there . Based on controversial novel by Michael Crichton , it is adapted by Philip Kaufman and Crichton, blending business, Japanese customs, high technology and international politics, turning out some confusing and silly . For that reason, the screenplay was rewritten several times, focusing more the killing suspense and relying heavily on relationship between two leads and the differences US-Japan . Michael Crichton, author of the book and co-author of the screenplay, wrote the part of Connor with Sean Connery in mind. Writers Michael Crichton and Michael Backes quit the project largely over disagreement with director Philip Kaufman that one of the lead characters should be changed into an African-American . Evocative Japanese music score by Takemitsu (Kurosawa's usual musician) and appropriate cinematography with stylized camera techniques by Michael Chapman . This one gets acceptable direction by Philip Kaufman (Quills, Right stuff, Body snatchers) . The film will appeal to Wesley Snipes and Sean Connery fans.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":44693,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1993-07-30","keywords":"businessman,murder of a prostitute,business executive,murder investigation,ex police captain","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Rising Sun","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi646185241","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGNlOWU3NWMtZjRjNy00NzVkLTkxNTgtNzllMTBkYmY0ZWUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGNlOWU3NWMtZjRjNy00NzVkLTkxNTgtNzllMTBkYmY0ZWUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000125/","name":"Sean Connery"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000648/","name":"Wesley Snipes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000172/","name":"Harvey Keitel"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0442241/","name":"Philip Kaufman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056999/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000341/","name":"Michael Crichton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0442241/","name":"Philip Kaufman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0045660/","name":"Michael Backes"}],"duration":"PT2H5M"}</script><metacontent="
